---
title: "NY Plots"
---

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(CoV19)
```

```{r ny_plot, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
x <- subset(states, region=="NY")
x <- rbind(x, data.frame(date=as.Date("2020-03-25"), region="WA", positive=2469, negative=NA, pending=NA, hospitalized=NA, death=123, total.tests=NA, totalTestResults=NA))
x$icu <- as.integer(round(0.03*x$positive,0))
p1 <- my_plot(x, "NY", "2020-03-20")
y <- x %>% pivot_longer(
  cols = c("hospitalized", "death", "icu"),
  names_to = "type",
  values_to = "count",
  values_drop_na = FALSE)
p2 <- qplot(date, count, data=y, geom="line", color=type)
grid.arrange(p1,p2, ncol=1)
```

